profile_bio:
We're championing possibilities for all by making money fast, easy, and more enjoyable. Our hope is unlock opportunities for people in their everyday lives and empower the millions of people and businesses around the world who trust, rely, and use PayPal every day. 

For support, visit the PayPal Help Center. https://payp.al/help

For employment opportunities, check out our job openings in the 'Jobs' tab. We're an equal opportunity employer that welcomes diversity, and offer generous benefits to help you thrive at work and in your free time.

extracted_posts.post_content: We’re thrilled to announce thatAaron James Websterwill be joining PayPal as Executive Vice President, Chief Enterprise Services Officer on March 18. Aaron has extensive experience leading risk management and global operations for some of the world’s most recognized companies.https://bit.ly/3Pljmiu

We are excited to announce that Amy Bonitatibus has been named Chief Corporate Affairs and Communications Officer. Bonitatibus brings a wealth of experience leading communications in the financial services industry and deep expertise in reputation management to the role. She was most recently the Chief Communications Officer at Wells Fargo and previously served as Chief Communications Officer for Chase.https://lnkd.in/gSaFtyne

We are excited to announce thatGeoff Seeleyhas joined PayPal as Chief Marketing Officer. Seeley brings over 25 years in global brand, digital, and performance marketing, while building teams to drive transformative marketing models. Seeley was most recently the Global CMO and Communications Officer at Afterpay and in marketing at CashApp.https://lnkd.in/eBDxuf3x

PayPal reported fourth quarter and full year 2023 results today, delivering a solid quarter during the most important shopping season for our customers. Listen to our conference call at 2 p.m. PST athttp://pypl.comand read our press release at the link below for full details.http://payp.al/Q4
See all the innovations revealed in PayPal’s First Look showcase and discover what’s in store for PayPal and Venmo this year.https://bit.ly/3HzzKIa#PayPalFirstLook
It’s time ⏰ Tune in to our YouTube channel today at 9:30 a.m. PT for an exclusive preview of the new products PayPal and Venmo will introduce this year.#PayPalFirstLookyoutube.com/paypal

Ready to see how PayPal is revolutionizing commerce? Tune in tomorrow, Thursday, Jan. 25 at 9:30 am. PT, to see PayPal President and CEOAlex Chrissgive an exclusive preview of the first innovations PayPal and Venmo are piloting and bringing to market this year.youtube.com/paypal#PayPalFirstLook
More than 20 years ago, PayPal revolutionized commerce. CEOAlex Chrisswill preview how we're doing it again at#PayPalFirstLookon January 25 at 9:30 a.m. PT. Tune in on YouTube:youtube.com/paypal

As we reflect on 2023, we are inspired by the generosity our customers showed throughout the last year. Over 76 million global customers used PayPal to donate more than $21 billion to support nonprofits and causes around the world. We're proud to help power that impact and can’t wait to see the difference our community will make in 2024. Learn how you can donate here:https://bit.ly/3RPuTqI

We are proud to have recently been named as a top company for career growth by the 2023American Opportunity Index. We believe our employees are one of our most valuable assets, and we are honored to be recognized for our commitment to their career development and growth.#AmericanOpportunityIndexhttps://lnkd.in/g9GmD_5g

We’re proud to share that PayPal received a top score of 100 on theHuman Rights Campaign's Corporate Equality Index for the eighth consecutive year! We believe that diversity is our strength, and inclusion should be at the core of everything we do. We’re honored to be recognized for our efforts to champion LGBTQ+ equality and create a workplace where everyone can thrive.#CEI2023#Equality100https://lnkd.in/eyatdkp

At PayPal, we’re committed to harnessing the power of our technology and scale to support charities and help people give back to the causes they care about. We’re excited to share thatPayPal Giving Fundis expanding its partnership withMetato exclusively enable charitable giving on Facebook and Instagram in the US, UK, Australia and Canada. 
 
PayPal Giving Fund’s mission is to support charities by enabling them to benefit from new forms of giving. Charities will be able to raise money through fundraisers and donation buttons on Facebook and Instagram, and donations will be received by PayPal Giving Fund and granted to benefiting charities in accordance with its policies.https://lnkd.in/g5QKTwZ

PayPalreposted this President and CEO, PayPal "Cyber 5" are the most important shopping days of the year for our customers and our team worked around the clock to equip small businesses with the tools they need to make every possible sale and give shoppers the opportunity to buy gifts for their families while saving their hard-earned money. As we pull preliminary numbers from Thanksgiving to Cyber Monday, I'm feeling proud of the pivotal role thatPayPalplays in the world and the impact we’re having in our customers' lives:

🔵  We processed approximately 400M transactions
🔵  We put more than $8M back in our customers’ pockets with cash back and savings (more than $2M on Black Friday alone!)
🔵  Cyber Monday was the single largest shopping day of the year so far with approximately $5.8B in TPV and more than 87M transactions (61K transactions per minute!) 

Setting numbers aside, it makes it very real for us when we hear firsthand from entrepreneurs likeJanine Mastrorilliowner of New York-based handbag company Independent Reign, andLeon Leong 梁志康, founder of Singapore-based watchmaker BOLDR Supply Co. how critical this time has been for them and their gratitude for the role our team plays in supporting them 365 days/year. 
 
So to the PayPal team: THANK YOU for your hard work and dedication. We still have more work to do throughout peak season and beyond, but I’m grateful and encouraged by how we are delivering for our customers when it matters the most. 🙌

It's#GivingTuesday! We're continually inspired by the PayPal community's spirit of generosity. Last year, PayPal processed more than 20 billion dollars in donations. 

As we enter the holiday giving season, we’re providing more ways for people to connect and give to the causes they care about. Whether you’re contributing to a community fundraiser, discovering a new charity to support, or making a micro-donation at checkout, Giving Tuesday and the holiday season is a time to help however you can.

Learn more herehttps://bit.ly/47RTKkb

Happy#SmallBusinessSaturday! Small businesses are an essential part of our communities, and we’re grateful for the small business owners worldwide who choose PayPal to power their businesses. Visit your favorite local business today to celebrate and support all that they do for their communities.

Today we announced the addition of several new leaders as we position PayPal for its next phase of growth.Isabel Cruzwill join PayPal as Chief People Officer. Michelle Gill is joining PayPal as EVP, General Manager of a newly formed Small Business and Financial Services Group.Diego Scottiwill join PayPal as EVP, General Manager of a newly formed Consumer Group and Global Marketing and Communications organization.

Our new executive team reflects our commitment to building a high-performing organization that will create the best possible products and experiences for our customers.

Learn more here:https://lnkd.in/g7VNfCxx

Today we introduced Venmo Groups, the newest feature arriving in the app so users can conveniently track, manage, and settle up multiple expenses among groups like friends, family, roommates, partners, sports leagues and more. Read more here:https://venmo.me/groups

During November, our Serve Employee Resource Group for Veterans and allies celebrates Veterans Month to show appreciation for all those who have served their country. To kick off the month, PayPal President and CEOAlex Chrissshared a special video message with Serve about his personal connection to the community and to thank members for their service.

Our Employee Resource Groups (ERGs) are at the heart of our culture. We recently welcomed our global ERG leaders to San Jose for an engaging and inspiring leadership summit that focused on navigating change and driving impact. Our President and CEOAlex Chrissjoined to discuss the essential role ERGs play in building culture and how best to support these vital communities. Thank you to all our ERG leaders for all you do!

PayPal reported its third quarter results today demonstrating continued progress against our strategic initiatives.https://payp.al/Q3EarningsAlex Chriss, PayPal President and CEO, said: “My first 30 days leading PayPal have confirmed my belief in the company's strong assets and market position. Now, we must harness these strengths and put the weight of the organization behind our most important priorities. In the process, we will become more efficient so we can innovate and execute with higher velocity. The opportunity to drive greater impact for our customers and unlock profitable growth makes it an exciting time to be at PayPal."

We’re excited to welcomeJamie Millerto PayPal as our next Chief Financial Officer (CFO). Jamie brings her deep experience as a CFO, strategist, and business leader at global companies such as General Electric, EY, and Cargill. 

Alex Chriss, PayPal President and CEO, said: “Jamie is an accomplished CFO and business executive who has worked across many industries and guided both public and private companies through dynamic environments and meaningful transformation during her impressive 33-year career. She brings a proven track record of driving strong financial results, instilling financial and operational discipline, and demonstrating inspirational leadership.”https://payp.al/CFO

Women’s economic empowerment has the power to uplift families, communities and the entire global economy. This week, we announced investments inSweef CapitalandQuona Capitalas part of our $108 million commitment to advance financial inclusion and economic empowerment for women and girls. We're proud to invest in organizations that help fulfill our mission to shape a more inclusive financial services system. These investments are the first of our forthcoming $100 million in capital investments into funds and other initiatives that are led by women or focused on serving women. Learn more about the investments and our overall commitment:https://lnkd.in/gyr2xi5H

Today, we announced the recipients of our 2023 PayPal Maggie Lena Walker Award. Named in honor of the first woman to charter and run a U.S. bank, the award recognizes four women who have charted new paths in their industries, demonstrated a commitment to economically empowering those in their communities, and are ultimately creating a more inclusive world. Congratulations to this year’s recipients:Tulaine M.,Arian Simone,Bree Jones,Omi Bell!  
 
Learn more about our recipients:https://lnkd.in/gktfwB8B#PayPalMLWAward

We’re thrilled to haveAlex Chrisson board as PayPal’s new President and CEO. Alex joined us from Intuit, where he spent more than 20 years working to empower and enable small businesses. Today, he greeted the PayPal community at our global headquarters in San Jose for a special CEO fireside chat with former President and CEODan Schulman. Welcome to PayPal, Alex! 🎉

Today, we announced that customers now have the option to add their eligible PayPal or Venmo credit and debit cards to Apple Wallet. Cardholders will be able to use Apple Pay to make quick and secure payments in-store, online or on their favorite apps while still being able to earn the same cashback and rewards that they love on their eligible purchases they would get with their physical card. Find out more here:https://lnkd.in/gjyyps_Z

PayPal has been named toFortune’s 2023 Change the World list for the fourth consecutive year. Each year, this list features companies with innovative business strategies that positively impact the world. We believe that we have a responsibility to work together to ensure more people and businesses are able to participate in the digital economy safely and securely. We’re proud to be recognized for our work to prioritize safe and secure products, protect our customers, and safeguard the digital economy.https://lnkd.in/g3waUnQ#ChangeTheWorld

As we celebrate Latinx Heritage Month in the U.S., we’re reflecting on the histories, cultures, and contributions of individuals from across the Latinx community. To kick off the month,Elisabeth Diaz, our Aliados employee resource group (ERG) Global Co-Lead hosted a conversation withJuan Luis Bordes, Vice President of Sales in Mexico and LATAM, about his career journey, the talent opportunity in Mexico and LATAM, and the importance of being proud of your heritage.
 
Throughout this month, we’ll be hosting several events centered around this year’s theme of “Unidos/United: Inclusivity for a Stronger PayPal,” which recognizes and celebrates how the diversity of our Latinx community at PayPal makes us stronger.

For more than five years, we have partnered with theCherie Blair Foundation for Womento empower women entrepreneurs around the globe. We’re excited to announce that we are joining the Foundation in their latest commitment to action: to support one million women entrepreneurs start, sustain or scale their business by 2030. This commitment is in line with the end point of the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals, and directly contributes to goal 5: gender equality and goal 8: decent work and economic growth. Learn more:https://lnkd.in/g7QYqq3D

We’re excited to join theBetter Business Bureau Institute for Marketplace Trust's Corporate Trust Council, a coalition of companies working to foster a trustworthy marketplace. Through this partnership, PayPal will explore new ways to protect our customers by investing in solutions that prevent fraud and scams. We’re committed to protecting our customers and keeping their accounts, financial and personal details safe throughout the entire checkout process.
 
Learn more about our partnership here:https://lnkd.in/gjC5eMCz

Support relief and recovery efforts to help people affected by the earthquake in Morocco and flooding in Libya. PayPal will cover all processing costs, ensuring that 100% of donations will support organizations that are responding to the disaster. * Visithttps://lnkd.in/d97u6QSto donate.  
*For donations not made in USD, a currency conversion fee may apply.

Expanding local economic opportunity is at the heart of our Community Impact program. The PayPal Community Impact Grant initiative draws on the passion of our global employees to make a difference in their communities while working towards our mission of creating economic opportunity and improving financial health for all.

This year, our employees selected 77 organizations who will receive monetary grants of up to $20,000 along with volunteer support and pro bono resources. Learn more about the organizations our employees selected:https://lnkd.in/g5CsGAhT#PayPalCommunityImpact

Today PayPal welcomes Rachel Kobetz, who is joining the team as Senior Vice President and Chief Design officer. Rachel brings more than 20 years in senior leadership experience and extensive design vision, experience strategy, and operational leadership to PayPal. She will be responsible for the design strategy and execution at scale across all end-to-end experiences (including PayPal, PayPal Braintree, Happy Returns, Honey, Venmo, Xoom, and Zettle) for consumers, merchants, developers, and employees globally. Read more on the PayPal Newsroom:https://lnkd.in/gvQxqnYC

We’re proud to be a company where our employees can bring their full selves to work and where inclusion is a core value. Throughout August, our employee community joined together in celebration of the diversity of beliefs and cultures within PayPal thanks to a month of fantastic programming from Believe, PayPal’s inter-faith employee resource group (ERG).  Our Believe leaders hosted educational events and conversations, including a Jeopardy-style trivia to learn about many different faiths, and a panel with members from each PayPal ERG to discuss how their faith or worldview inspires them to serve their colleagues, teams, and communities. Thank you to our Believe community for their planning and participation! Learn more about our ERGs:https://bit.ly/3sGn0ex

Support relief and recovery efforts to help people affected by Hurricane Idalia. PayPal will cover all processing costs, ensuring that 100% of donations will support organizations that are responding to the disaster. * Visithttps://lnkd.in/d97u6QSto donate.  

*For donations not made in USD, a currency conversion fee may apply.

Today,Hallmark CardsandVenmoannounced a first-of-its-kind collaboration that makes gifting easier with the launch of Hallmark + Venmo Cards. Customers can now securely send money with Venmo in a physical Hallmark card, offering a new, unique and convenient way of gifting to friends and family. By bringing together Hallmark’s legacy of caring and Venmo’s social, secure and simple payments, the two brands are transforming the gift giving experience. Find out more here:https://bit.ly/47WG5sU

Trusted names in crypto and payments have teamed up. Introducing PayPal on Ledger Live. Buy Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies through Ledger Live using PayPal in just a few clicks*. Simple and convenient. Learn more:https://bit.ly/45e36pv*Terms apply:https://bit.ly/3QEUzHR

Today, PayPal announcedAlex Chrisswill join our company as President and CEO, effective September 27, 2023. Chriss joins PayPal from financial software company Intuit where he’s worked for nearly 20 years and was most recently the Executive Vice President and General Manager of Intuit’s Small Business and Self-Employed Group.

Chriss said, “PayPal is an extraordinary company that plays a critical role in the lives of consumers and merchants all over the world. Throughout my career, I have championed small and medium businesses and entrepreneurs, who are the backbone of every economy in the world. I am proud to take the baton from Dan and thrilled to have the opportunity to work with PayPal’s talented and committed team to build on PayPal’s remarkable history and draw on its unique capabilities to deliver outstanding products and services to businesses and consumers.”https://lnkd.in/d9tyUf3f

#WorldRefugeeDaycelebrates the bravery, resolve and strength of people that have been forced to flee their home country and resettle in another. PayPal continues to leverage the unique assets at our disposal to empower refugee entrepreneurs and individuals. We’re enabling online payments, providing access to capital, and facilitating international remittances so that individuals and small businesses can fully and fairly participate in the global economy, no matter where they come from. 

To support these communities long-term, we’re building on our partnership with theTent Partnership for Refugeesto help them launch three new refugee mentorship programs in the U.S. specifically for Afghan, Hispanic, and women refugees. These programs will fill the gap in access to employment opportunities and financial empowerment. Learn more about our commitment to supporting refugee communities:https://bit.ly/43P0Y72

We’re proud to share our new commitment to disability inclusion action as a member ofthe Valuable 500, a global coalition of companies committed to make business more inclusive of people with disabilities. With a focus on being an inclusive employer and empowering our customers, we are committed to supporting individuals with apparent and nonapparent disabilities by building accessibility into our employee lifecycle and products. 

Our Chief Information Security OfficerAssaf Kerenshares more about our commitment here:https://bit.ly/3Ws8XEe#DisabilityInclusion#Accessibility

We are proud to share our latest Global Impact Report, which illustrates the many ways the PayPal community came together in the past year to continue building a more inclusive and equitable economy for all.   

In 2022, we created more ways for our customers to give, supported small and medium-sized businesses, worked to mitigate our environmental footprint, empowered employee community impact, and continued to prioritize our employees’ financial, mental, and physical health. 

Learn more here:https://bit.ly/3LVAIRL

Have you received a money request or an invoice you don’t recognize? PayPal is helping you to spot scammers and report fraudulent money requests. Now, you can block and report suspicious requests and easily view your payment history with businesses. 

Learn more:https://bit.ly/4114mt9

Every year on#EarthDay, the world raises awareness of the need to protect the environment and invest in our planet. At PayPal, we are working to reduce our environmental footprint and support sustainability projects in the communities where we live and work. 

Learn more about the opportunities we are providing for employees and customers to create a sustainable and equitable future throughout the month of April:https://bit.ly/40q44Mc

PayPal CEODan Schulmanrecently sat down withGlenda McNealofAmerican Expressto discuss his own personal career learnings, his perspective on mission-driven leadership, the value of partnerships and more. Tune in to their full conversation here:https://bit.ly/43Rjpbo

We’re excited to announce that PayPal andLive Nation Entertainmenthave signed a multi-year deal to bring simple and secure payments to fans worldwide. As part of this, PayPal will beTicketmaster’s Preferred Payments Partner and PayPal Braintree will now be the primary payment processor for Ticketmaster globally. Fans will be able to pay with PayPal, Pay Later products and Venmo across Ticketmaster’s platforms. Learn more:https://bit.ly/3KtyOXL

As a part of PayPal’s#WomensHistoryMonthcelebration, senior leadersPeggy Marie Alford, EVP of Global Sales and Merchant Services;Archie Deskus, EVP and Chief Information Officer; andGabrielle Scheibe Rabinovitch, SVP and acting Chief Financial Officer shared reflections on their careers and advice that most helped them in their journeys to PayPal’s Leadership Team:https://bit.ly/3G5HbX8

prompts_output.Prompt: Categorize these posts into different themes related to cryptocurrency (e.g., regulation, technological advancements, market predictions). Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output:
1. Technological Advancements: Blockchain's impact on finance and business.
2. Education/Resources: Learning resources for blockchain understanding.
3. Community/Events: Networking and skill-building in blockchain.
4. Industry Adoption: Financial sector's blockchain integration.
5. Professional Development: Importance of blockchain expertise.

Explanation: Each post is categorized based on its primary focus, ranging from technology to professional growth.

prompts_output.Prompt: Identify key influencers or accounts whose posts are most engaged with or have a significant following in the cryptocurrency space. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Key influencers in the cryptocurrency space include Gary Gensler, Brian Armstrong, Sam Altman, and Brad Garlinghouse, recognized for their impact on digital assets and Web3 by CoinDesk's Most Influential 2023 list.

prompts_output.Prompt: Analyze these posts for the most frequently used keywords and hashtags related to cryptocurrencies. Discuss their relevance and potential implications. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The keywords #blockchaintechnology, #Ethereum, #Solana, and #blockchain suggest a focus on the tech aspects of crypto, highlighting Ethereum and Solana's importance in the industry, and indicating a trend towards discussing innovation and adoption in the financial sector rather than market speculation.

prompts_output.Prompt: Assess these posts for insights into investor behavior, concerns, and expectations regarding cryptocurrencies. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts reflect a strategic and informed investor perspective, emphasizing blockchain's potential in finance and innovation rather than short-term cryptocurrency market fluctuations or specific investment advice. Investors seem focused on long-term impacts and technological advancements.

prompts_output.Prompt: Identify any posts that may contain misinformation or speculative claims about cryptocurrencies. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: None of the provided context contains misinformation or speculative claims about cryptocurrencies. The statements are general and focus on blockchain technology without promoting specific cryptocurrencies or investment strategies.

prompts_output.Prompt: Spot any emerging trends in topics discussed in these posts about the company. Are there any new developments, controversies, or milestones that are garnering attention? Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The emerging trends focus on blockchain's impact on finance, the importance of education in blockchain technology, community engagement through events, adoption by the financial industry, and the need for professional development. No controversies or milestones are mentioned in the provided context.

prompts_output.Prompt: Identify any patterns or strategies in these posts that resemble known cryptocurrency manipulation tactics such as pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: There are no patterns or strategies in the provided context that resemble known cryptocurrency manipulation tactics such as pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes. The content focuses on blockchain technology's impact and development advice rather than promoting specific cryptocurrencies for investment.

prompts_output.Prompt: Analyze these posts to determine if any show characteristics of being generated by bots or automated accounts. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The provided posts do not show characteristics of being generated by bots or automated accounts; they appear to be crafted by humans to engage an audience and promote events.

prompts_output.Prompt: Examine these posts for the presence of invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups, and assess their potential role in manipulation schemes. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: There are no invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups in the provided posts, so there is no basis to assess their role in any manipulation schemes.

prompts_output.Prompt: Categorize these posts based on their content and topics, focusing on how they relate to cryptocurrency market trends and investor behavior. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts do not directly relate to cryptocurrency market trends or investor behavior; they focus on blockchain technology's impact on finance and the importance of staying informed about blockchain developments. They offer a strategic perspective rather than investment advice or market analysis.

overall_prompt_summary: The provided posts center on blockchain's influence on finance and the significance of continuous learning in the field. They promote community engagement through events and highlight the financial sector's growing investment in blockchain. The key issues addressed are the transformative potential of blockchain in business strategies and the necessity for professionals to stay current with technological advancements. Additionally, the importance of educational resources and industry events is emphasized to foster community and professional growth. A potential improvement could be the inclusion of specific milestones or controversies to provide a more comprehensive view of the blockchain landscape.

For support, visit the PayPal Help Center. https://payp.al/help

For employment opportunities, check out our job openings in the 'Jobs' tab. We're an equal opportunity employer that welcomes diversity, and offer generous benefits to help you thrive at work and in your free time.

We recently welcomed our global ERG leaders to San Jose for an engaging and inspiring leadership summit that focused on navigating change and driving impact. Our President and CEOAlex Chrissjoined to discuss the essential role ERGs play in building culture and how best to support these vital communities. Thank you to all our ERG leaders for all you do!

PayPal reported its third quarter results today demonstrating continued progress against our strategic initiatives.https://payp.al/Q3EarningsAlex Chriss, PayPal President and CEO, said: “My first 30 days leading PayPal have confirmed my belief in the company's strong assets and market position. Now, we must harness these strengths and put the weight of the organization behind our most important priorities. In the process, we will become more efficient so we can innovate and execute with higher velocity. The opportunity to drive greater impact for our customers and unlock profitable growth makes it an exciting time to be at PayPal."

We’re excited to welcomeJamie Millerto PayPal as our next Chief Financial Officer (CFO). Jamie brings her deep experience as a CFO, strategist, and business leader at global companies such as General Electric, EY, and Cargill. 

Alex Chriss, PayPal President and CEO, said: “Jamie is an accomplished CFO and business executive who has worked across many industries and guided both public and private companies through dynamic environments and meaningful transformation during her impressive 33-year career. She brings a proven track record of driving strong financial results, instilling financial and operational discipline, and demonstrating inspirational leadership.”https://payp.al/CFO

Women’s economic empowerment has the power to uplift families, communities and the entire global economy. This week, we announced investments inSweef CapitalandQuona Capitalas part of our $108 million commitment to advance financial inclusion and economic empowerment for women and girls. We're proud to invest in organizations that help fulfill our mission to shape a more inclusive financial services system. These investments are the first of our forthcoming $100 million in capital investments into funds and other initiatives that are led by women or focused on serving women. Learn more about the investments and our overall commitment:https://lnkd.in/gyr2xi5H

Today, we announced the recipients of our 2023 PayPal Maggie Lena Walker Award. Named in honor of the first woman to charter and run a U.S. bank, the award recognizes four women who have charted new paths in their industries, demonstrated a commitment to economically empowering those in their communities, and are ultimately creating a more inclusive world. Congratulations to this year’s recipients:Tulaine M.,Arian Simone,Bree Jones,Omi Bell!  
 
Learn more about our recipients:https://lnkd.in/gktfwB8B#PayPalMLWAward

We’re thrilled to haveAlex Chrisson board as PayPal’s new President and CEO. Alex joined us from Intuit, where he spent more than 20 years working to empower and enable small businesses. Today, he greeted the PayPal community at our global headquarters in San Jose for a special CEO fireside chat with former President and CEODan Schulman. Welcome to PayPal, Alex! 🎉

Today, we announced that customers now have the option to add their eligible PayPal or Venmo credit and debit cards to Apple Wallet. Cardholders will be able to use Apple Pay to make quick and secure payments in-store, online or on their favorite apps while still being able to earn the same cashback and rewards that they love on their eligible purchases they would get with their physical card. Find out more here:https://lnkd.in/gjyyps_Z

PayPal has been named toFortune’s 2023 Change the World list for the fourth consecutive year. Each year, this list features companies with innovative business strategies that positively impact the world. We believe that we have a responsibility to work together to ensure more people and businesses are able to participate in the digital economy safely and securely. We’re proud to be recognized for our work to prioritize safe and secure products, protect our customers, and safeguard the digital economy.https://lnkd.in/g3waUnQ#ChangeTheWorld

As we celebrate Latinx Heritage Month in the U.S., we’re reflecting on the histories, cultures, and contributions of individuals from across the Latinx community. To kick off the month,Elisabeth Diaz, our Aliados employee resource group (ERG) Global Co-Lead hosted a conversation withJuan Luis Bordes, Vice President of Sales in Mexico and LATAM, about his career journey, the talent opportunity in Mexico and LATAM, and the importance of being proud of your heritage.
 
Throughout this month, we’ll be hosting several events centered around this year’s theme of “Unidos/United: Inclusivity for a Stronger PayPal,” which recognizes and celebrates how the diversity of our Latinx community at PayPal makes us stronger.

For more than five years, we have partnered with theCherie Blair Foundation for Womento empower women entrepreneurs around the globe. We’re excited to announce that we are joining the Foundation in their latest commitment to action: to support one million women entrepreneurs start, sustain or scale their business by 2030. This commitment is in line with the end point of the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals, and directly contributes to goal 5: gender equality and goal 8: decent work and economic growth. Learn more:https://lnkd.in/g7QYqq3D

We’re excited to join theBetter Business Bureau Institute for Marketplace Trust's Corporate Trust Council, a coalition of companies working to foster a trustworthy marketplace. Through this partnership, PayPal will explore new ways to protect our customers by investing in solutions that prevent fraud and scams. We’re committed to protecting our customers and keeping their accounts, financial and personal details safe throughout the entire checkout process.
 
Learn more about our partnership here:https://lnkd.in/gjC5eMCz

Support relief and recovery efforts to help people affected by the earthquake in Morocco and flooding in Libya. PayPal will cover all processing costs, ensuring that 100% of donations will support organizations that are responding to the disaster. * Visithttps://lnkd.in/d97u6QSto donate.  
*For donations not made in USD, a currency conversion fee may apply.

Expanding local economic opportunity is at the heart of our Community Impact program. The PayPal Community Impact Grant initiative draws on the passion of our global employees to make a difference in their communities while working towards our mission of creating economic opportunity and improving financial health for all.

This year, our employees selected 77 organizations who will receive monetary grants of up to $20,000 along with volunteer support and pro bono resources. Learn more about the organizations our employees selected:https://lnkd.in/g5CsGAhT#PayPalCommunityImpact

Today PayPal welcomes Rachel Kobetz, who is joining the team as Senior Vice President and Chief Design officer. Rachel brings more than 20 years in senior leadership experience and extensive design vision, experience strategy, and operational leadership to PayPal. She will be responsible for the design strategy and execution at scale across all end-to-end experiences (including PayPal, PayPal Braintree, Happy Returns, Honey, Venmo, Xoom, and Zettle) for consumers, merchants, developers, and employees globally. Read more on the PayPal Newsroom:https://lnkd.in/gvQxqnYC

We’re proud to be a company where our employees can bring their full selves to work and where inclusion is a core value. Throughout August, our employee community joined together in celebration of the diversity of beliefs and cultures within PayPal thanks to a month of fantastic programming from Believe, PayPal’s inter-faith employee resource group (ERG).  Our Believe leaders hosted educational events and conversations, including a Jeopardy-style trivia to learn about many different faiths, and a panel with members from each PayPal ERG to discuss how their faith or worldview inspires them to serve their colleagues, teams, and communities. Thank you to our Believe community for their planning and participation! Learn more about our ERGs:https://bit.ly/3sGn0ex

Support relief and recovery efforts to help people affected by Hurricane Idalia. PayPal will cover all processing costs, ensuring that 100% of donations will support organizations that are responding to the disaster. * Visithttps://lnkd.in/d97u6QSto donate.  

*For donations not made in USD, a currency conversion fee may apply.

Today,Hallmark CardsandVenmoannounced a first-of-its-kind collaboration that makes gifting easier with the launch of Hallmark + Venmo Cards. Customers can now securely send money with Venmo in a physical Hallmark card, offering a new, unique and convenient way of gifting to friends and family. By bringing together Hallmark’s legacy of caring and Venmo’s social, secure and simple payments, the two brands are transforming the gift giving experience. Find out more here:https://bit.ly/47WG5sU

Trusted names in crypto and payments have teamed up. Introducing PayPal on Ledger Live. Buy Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies through Ledger Live using PayPal in just a few clicks*. Simple and convenient. Learn more:https://bit.ly/45e36pv*Terms apply:https://bit.ly/3QEUzHR

Today, PayPal announcedAlex Chrisswill join our company as President and CEO, effective September 27, 2023. Chriss joins PayPal from financial software company Intuit where he’s worked for nearly 20 years and was most recently the Executive Vice President and General Manager of Intuit’s Small Business and Self-Employed Group.

Chriss said, “PayPal is an extraordinary company that plays a critical role in the lives of consumers and merchants all over the world. Throughout my career, I have championed small and medium businesses and entrepreneurs, who are the backbone of every economy in the world. I am proud to take the baton from Dan and thrilled to have the opportunity to work with PayPal’s talented and committed team to build on PayPal’s remarkable history and draw on its unique capabilities to deliver outstanding products and services to businesses and consumers.”https://lnkd.in/d9tyUf3f

#WorldRefugeeDaycelebrates the bravery, resolve and strength of people that have been forced to flee their home country and resettle in another. PayPal continues to leverage the unique assets at our disposal to empower refugee entrepreneurs and individuals. We’re enabling online payments, providing access to capital, and facilitating international remittances so that individuals and small businesses can fully and fairly participate in the global economy, no matter where they come from. 

To support these communities long-term, we’re building on our partnership with theTent Partnership for Refugeesto help them launch three new refugee mentorship programs in the U.S. specifically for Afghan, Hispanic, and women refugees. These programs will fill the gap in access to employment opportunities and financial empowerment. Learn more about our commitment to supporting refugee communities:https://bit.ly/43P0Y72

We’re proud to share our new commitment to disability inclusion action as a member ofthe Valuable 500, a global coalition of companies committed to make business more inclusive of people with disabilities. With a focus on being an inclusive employer and empowering our customers, we are committed to supporting individuals with apparent and nonapparent disabilities by building accessibility into our employee lifecycle and products. 

Our Chief Information Security OfficerAssaf Kerenshares more about our commitment here:https://bit.ly/3Ws8XEe#DisabilityInclusion#Accessibility

We are proud to share our latest Global Impact Report, which illustrates the many ways the PayPal community came together in the past year to continue building a more inclusive and equitable economy for all.   

In 2022, we created more ways for our customers to give, supported small and medium-sized businesses, worked to mitigate our environmental footprint, empowered employee community impact, and continued to prioritize our employees’ financial, mental, and physical health. 

Learn more here:https://bit.ly/3LVAIRL

Have you received a money request or an invoice you don’t recognize? PayPal is helping you to spot scammers and report fraudulent money requests. Now, you can block and report suspicious requests and easily view your payment history with businesses. 

Learn more:https://bit.ly/4114mt9

Every year on#EarthDay, the world raises awareness of the need to protect the environment and invest in our planet. At PayPal, we are working to reduce our environmental footprint and support sustainability projects in the communities where we live and work. 

Learn more about the opportunities we are providing for employees and customers to create a sustainable and equitable future throughout the month of April:https://bit.ly/40q44Mc

PayPal CEODan Schulmanrecently sat down withGlenda McNealofAmerican Expressto discuss his own personal career learnings, his perspective on mission-driven leadership, the value of partnerships and more. Tune in to their full conversation here:https://bit.ly/43Rjpbo

We’re excited to announce that PayPal andLive Nation Entertainmenthave signed a multi-year deal to bring simple and secure payments to fans worldwide. As part of this, PayPal will beTicketmaster’s Preferred Payments Partner and PayPal Braintree will now be the primary payment processor for Ticketmaster globally. Fans will be able to pay with PayPal, Pay Later products and Venmo across Ticketmaster’s platforms. Learn more:https://bit.ly/3KtyOXL

As a part of PayPal’s#WomensHistoryMonthcelebration, senior leadersPeggy Marie Alford, EVP of Global Sales and Merchant Services;Archie Deskus, EVP and Chief Information Officer; andGabrielle Scheibe Rabinovitch, SVP and acting Chief Financial Officer shared reflections on their careers and advice that most helped them in their journeys to PayPal’s Leadership Team:https://bit.ly/3G5HbX8

prompts_output.Prompt: Categorize these posts into different themes related to cryptocurrency (e.g., regulation, technological advancements, market predictions). Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output:
1. Technological Advancements: The post discusses the impact of blockchain on digital finance, mentioning Ethereum and Solana.
2. Education/Community Engagement: The post promotes a webinar and summit, focusing on knowledge sharing within the community.
3. Business Strategy/Enterprise Adoption: The post addresses financial companies' strategic investment in blockchain technology.

prompts_output.Prompt: Identify key influencers or accounts whose posts are most engaged with or have a significant following in the cryptocurrency space. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Key influencers in the cryptocurrency space include Gary Gensler, Brian Armstrong, Sam Altman, and Brad Garlinghouse, recognized for their significant impact on the industry by CoinDesk's 2023 list.

prompts_output.Prompt: Analyze these posts for the most frequently used keywords and hashtags related to cryptocurrencies. Discuss their relevance and potential implications. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The keywords #blockchain, #Ethereum, #Solana, and #blockchainsolutions suggest a focus on blockchain technology and its applications in finance, indicating a trend towards leveraging blockchain for improving financial services rather than discussing cryptocurrency trading or investment strategies.

prompts_output.Prompt: Assess these posts for insights into investor behavior, concerns, and expectations regarding cryptocurrencies. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts do not provide insights into investor behavior, concerns, or expectations regarding cryptocurrencies; they focus on blockchain technology's role in financial services and development advice.

prompts_output.Prompt: Identify any posts that may contain misinformation or speculative claims about cryptocurrencies. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: None of the provided context contains misinformation or speculative claims about cryptocurrencies. The posts focus on blockchain technology and its adoption without making investment claims or predictions.

prompts_output.Prompt: Spot any emerging trends in topics discussed in these posts about the company. Are there any new developments, controversies, or milestones that are garnering attention? Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The emerging trend is the integration of blockchain in financial services, emphasizing its potential for customer engagement and competitive strategy. No specific new developments, controversies, or milestones are mentioned. Focus is on technical challenges and educational initiatives in blockchain technology.

prompts_output.Prompt: Identify any patterns or strategies in these posts that resemble known cryptocurrency manipulation tactics such as pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: There are no patterns or strategies in the provided context that resemble known cryptocurrency manipulation tactics such as pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes. The posts focus on blockchain technology and security, not on promoting specific cryptocurrencies for investment.

prompts_output.Prompt: Analyze these posts to determine if any show characteristics of being generated by bots or automated accounts. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: There's no clear indication that these posts are generated by bots or automated accounts; they seem to be from human social media managers or marketers focused on blockchain education and development.

prompts_output.Prompt: Examine these posts for the presence of invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups, and assess their potential role in manipulation schemes. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: There are no invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups present in the provided posts, hence they do not play a role in any manipulation schemes.

prompts_output.Prompt: Categorize these posts based on their content and topics, focusing on how they relate to cryptocurrency market trends and investor behavior. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts cannot be categorized based on cryptocurrency market trends or investor behavior as they do not address these topics; they focus on blockchain technology's impact on financial services and the importance of education and security in this context.

overall_prompt_summary: The posts analyzed are educational and promotional in nature, focusing on blockchain technology and its applications in finance and business. They are not linked to any cryptocurrency manipulation schemes and lack any direct investment promotion. The most important issues addressed include the transformative impact of blockchain on digital finance and the growing interest from financial companies in leveraging this technology. Additionally, there is an emphasis on community engagement and knowledge sharing through events like webinars and engineering summits. A potential improvement could be the inclusion of more detailed case studies or success stories to illustrate the practical benefits of blockchain adoption in various industries.

profile_bio:
We're championing possibilities for all by making money fast, easy, and more enjoyable. Our hope is unlock opportunities for people in their everyday lives and empower the millions of people and businesses around the world who trust, rely, and use PayPal every day. 

For support, visit the PayPal Help Center. https://payp.al/help

For employment opportunities, check out our job openings in the 'Jobs' tab. We're an equal opportunity employer that welcomes diversity, and offer generous benefits to help you thrive at work and in your free time.

Aaron has extensive experience leading risk management and global operations for some of the world’s most recognized companies.https://bit.ly/3Pljmiu

We are excited to announce that Amy Bonitatibus has been named Chief Corporate Affairs and Communications Officer. Bonitatibus brings a wealth of experience leading communications in the financial services industry and deep expertise in reputation management to the role. She was most recently the Chief Communications Officer at Wells Fargo and previously served as Chief Communications Officer for Chase.https://lnkd.in/gSaFtyne

We are excited to announce thatGeoff Seeleyhas joined PayPal as Chief Marketing Officer. Seeley brings over 25 years in global brand, digital, and performance marketing, while building teams to drive transformative marketing models. Seeley was most recently the Global CMO and Communications Officer at Afterpay and in marketing at CashApp.https://lnkd.in/eBDxuf3x

PayPal reported fourth quarter and full year 2023 results today, delivering a solid quarter during the most important shopping season for our customers. Listen to our conference call at 2 p.m. PST athttp://pypl.comand read our press release at the link below for full details.http://payp.al/Q4

As we reflect on 2023, we are inspired by the generosity our customers showed throughout the last year. Over 76 million global customers used PayPal to donate more than $21 billion to support nonprofits and causes around the world. We're proud to help power that impact and can’t wait to see the difference our community will make in 2024. Learn how you can donate here:https://bit.ly/3RPuTqI

We are proud to have recently been named as a top company for career growth by the 2023American Opportunity Index. We believe our employees are one of our most valuable assets, and we are honored to be recognized for our commitment to their career development and growth.#AmericanOpportunityIndexhttps://lnkd.in/g9GmD_5g

We’re proud to share that PayPal received a top score of 100 on theHuman Rights Campaign's Corporate Equality Index for the eighth consecutive year! We believe that diversity is our strength, and inclusion should be at the core of everything we do. We’re honored to be recognized for our efforts to champion LGBTQ+ equality and create a workplace where everyone can thrive.#CEI2023#Equality100https://lnkd.in/eyatdkp

At PayPal, we’re committed to harnessing the power of our technology and scale to support charities and help people give back to the causes they care about. We’re excited to share thatPayPal Giving Fundis expanding its partnership withMetato exclusively enable charitable giving on Facebook and Instagram in the US, UK, Australia and Canada. 
 
PayPal Giving Fund’s mission is to support charities by enabling them to benefit from new forms of giving. Charities will be able to raise money through fundraisers and donation buttons on Facebook and Instagram, and donations will be received by PayPal Giving Fund and granted to benefiting charities in accordance with its policies.https://lnkd.in/g5QKTwZ

PayPalreposted this President and CEO, PayPal "Cyber 5" are the most important shopping days of the year for our customers and our team worked around the clock to equip small businesses with the tools they need to make every possible sale and give shoppers the opportunity to buy gifts for their families while saving their hard-earned money. As we pull preliminary numbers from Thanksgiving to Cyber Monday, I'm feeling proud of the pivotal role thatPayPalplays in the world and the impact we’re having in our customers' lives:

🔵  We processed approximately 400M transactions
🔵  We put more than $8M back in our customers’ pockets with cash back and savings (more than $2M on Black Friday alone!)
🔵  Cyber Monday was the single largest shopping day of the year so far with approximately $5.8B in TPV and more than 87M transactions (61K transactions per minute!) 

Setting numbers aside, it makes it very real for us when we hear firsthand from entrepreneurs likeJanine Mastrorilliowner of New York-based handbag company Independent Reign, andLeon Leong 梁志康, founder of Singapore-based watchmaker BOLDR Supply Co. how critical this time has been for them and their gratitude for the role our team plays in supporting them 365 days/year. 
 
So to the PayPal team: THANK YOU for your hard work and dedication. We still have more work to do throughout peak season and beyond, but I’m grateful and encouraged by how we are delivering for our customers when it matters the most. 🙌

It's#GivingTuesday! We're continually inspired by the PayPal community's spirit of generosity. Last year, PayPal processed more than 20 billion dollars in donations.

prompts_output.Prompt: Categorize these posts into different themes related to cryptocurrency (e.g., regulation, technological advancements, market predictions). Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.

2. Education/Community Engagement: Focuses on webinars and summits for community knowledge sharing.
3. Business Strategy/Enterprise Adoption: Covers financial companies investing in blockchain for strategic benefits.

These themes emphasize education, technology, and business strategy in the context of blockchain.

They value education and understanding of the technology for business strategy, rather than expressing concerns or expectations about specific cryptocurrency investments.

overall_prompt_summary: The provided context suggests a focus on blockchain technology's influence on finance and community education. It also highlights corporate interest in digital assets for strategic growth. The most significant issues addressed include the educational aspect of blockchain technology and the engagement of the financial community in adopting these innovations. Additionally, the emphasis on technological advancements and enterprise adoption indicates a trend towards mainstream acceptance of blockchain. Potential improvements could involve providing more detailed insights into how these technologies are being integrated into specific business models and their impact on market dynamics.

profile_bio:
We're championing possibilities for all by making money fast, easy, and more enjoyable. Our hope is unlock opportunities for people in their everyday lives and empower the millions of people and businesses around the world who trust, rely, and use PayPal every day. 

For support, visit the PayPal Help Center. https://payp.al/help

For employment opportunities, check out our job openings in the 'Jobs' tab. We're an equal opportunity employer that welcomes diversity, and offer generous benefits to help you thrive at work and in your free time.

We’re excited to share thatPayPal Giving Fundis expanding its partnership withMetato exclusively enable charitable giving on Facebook and Instagram in the US, UK, Australia and Canada.

PayPalreposted this President and CEO, PayPal "Cyber 5" are the most important shopping days of the year for our customers and our team worked around the clock to equip small businesses with the tools they need to make every possible sale and give shoppers the opportunity to buy gifts for their families while saving their hard-earned money. As we pull preliminary numbers from Thanksgiving to Cyber Monday, I'm feeling proud of the pivotal role thatPayPalplays in the world and the impact we’re having in our customers' lives:

🔵  We processed approximately 400M transactions
🔵  We put more than $8M back in our customers’ pockets with cash back and savings (more than $2M on Black Friday alone!)
🔵  Cyber Monday was the single largest shopping day of the year so far with approximately $5.8B in TPV and more than 87M transactions (61K transactions per minute!) 

Setting numbers aside, it makes it very real for us when we hear firsthand from entrepreneurs likeJanine Mastrorilliowner of New York-based handbag company Independent Reign, andLeon Leong 梁志康, founder of Singapore-based watchmaker BOLDR Supply Co. how critical this time has been for them and their gratitude for the role our team plays in supporting them 365 days/year. 
 
So to the PayPal team: THANK YOU for your hard work and dedication. We still have more work to do throughout peak season and beyond, but I’m grateful and encouraged by how we are delivering for our customers when it matters the most. 🙌

It's#GivingTuesday! We're continually inspired by the PayPal community's spirit of generosity. Last year, PayPal processed more than 20 billion dollars in donations.

PayPal reported its third quarter results today demonstrating continued progress against our strategic initiatives.https://payp.al/Q3EarningsAlex Chriss, PayPal President and CEO, said: “My first 30 days leading PayPal have confirmed my belief in the company's strong assets and market position. Now, we must harness these strengths and put the weight of the organization behind our most important priorities. In the process, we will become more efficient so we can innovate and execute with higher velocity. The opportunity to drive greater impact for our customers and unlock profitable growth makes it an exciting time to be at PayPal."

We’re excited to welcomeJamie Millerto PayPal as our next Chief Financial Officer (CFO). Jamie brings her deep experience as a CFO, strategist, and business leader at global companies such as General Electric, EY, and Cargill. 

Alex Chriss, PayPal President and CEO, said: “Jamie is an accomplished CFO and business executive who has worked across many industries and guided both public and private companies through dynamic environments and meaningful transformation during her impressive 33-year career. She brings a proven track record of driving strong financial results, instilling financial and operational discipline, and demonstrating inspirational leadership.”https://payp.al/CFO

profile_bio:
We're championing possibilities for all by making money fast, easy, and more enjoyable. Our hope is unlock opportunities for people in their everyday lives and empower the millions of people and businesses around the world who trust, rely, and use PayPal every day. 

For support, visit the PayPal Help Center. https://payp.al/help

For employment opportunities, check out our job openings in the 'Jobs' tab. We're an equal opportunity employer that welcomes diversity, and offer generous benefits to help you thrive at work and in your free time.
